name: Introduction to C Programming
details: Learn the fundamentals of the C programming language in this comprehensive course. Master the syntax, data structures, and key concepts.

name: Introduction to Algorithms
details: Dive into the world of algorithms and problem-solving. Understand algorithmic thinking and analysis to tackle complex challenges.

name: Introduction to C++ for DSA
details: Explore the power of C++ for data structures and algorithms. Build efficient and scalable solutions for real-world problems.

name: Basic Data Structures
details: Master the foundational data structures that form the basis of software development. Enhance your problem-solving skills.

name: Introduction to OOP Python
details: Discover object-oriented programming in Python. Learn to design and create reusable code using OOP principles.

name: Software Engineering
details: Become a software engineering expert. Develop large-scale software systems and gain insights into best practices.

name: AWS, Cloud Computing
details: Harness the power of AWS and cloud computing. Deploy scalable applications and manage cloud resources efficiently.

name: Database (MySQL)
details: Explore the world of relational databases with MySQL. Learn database design, querying, and optimization.

name: Problem-Solving Part
details: Sharpen your problem-solving skills in various domains. Tackle complex issues with structured and creative approaches.
